short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find out what shopify theme is this website using. Get direct link!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to know what Shopify theme a store is using? Now, you can do that easily using this extension.

This lightweight extension provides you a theme name, along with its theme store URL so that you can easily find it. The extension works for most Shopify stores with 100% accuracy.

How does it work?
* Open a Shopify store in the browser
* Click the Shopify Theme Detector icon
* Youâ€™ll get the theme name & its theme store URL

The extension also helps you find out if a store is using Shopify platform or not. :)
